name: Steve the Navigator
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD to walk around.

This is a very short bitsy game about a grumpy captain and a slightly over-ambitious navigator. It's the second game for my personal game-a-week challenge, where I try to publish a game every Sunday.

It's made in the Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux (https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy).
